programme.title: Assir Al Madfoun
programme.desc: A murder case that remained unsolved for 10 years is reopened when the victim's friend reappears and his father points an accusing finger at the long-absent friend.

programme.title: Life Song
programme.desc: Beyram returns to his native Istanbul to reconcile with his close friend, and they agree to marry their children Kerim and Melek when they grow up. Kerim grew up in Germany; but his father forces him to return and marry Melek, but Hulya, Melek's younger sister, wants to marry him.

programme.title: My Home My Destiny
programme.desc: Zeynep is a young law student who finds herself torn between her two mothers. She has been trying for years to equalize the two parties and is appreciative of her mother's genuine sacrifices, but she also works hard to fulfill her mother's other ambitions.

programme.title: Al Moukhtafi
programme.desc: Four friends investigate the mysterious disappearance of the husband of one of them, which pushes them into a world of betrayal and false allegations.

programme.title: Tariq El Ward
programme.desc: The series revolves around a young village woman who is fond of roses. programme.title: Ghost Hunting
programme.desc: In order to confront the ghosts of his past, Palestinian director Raed Andoni assembles an eclectic group of ex-prisoners to build a replicate of Al-Moskobiya, Israel’s main interrogation centre, where he was himself jailed at age 18. From fragmentary memory, day after day, they give shape to the interrogation centre they all experienced, and re-enact its stories. As the walls of the cells rise, the tongues and the emotions loosen.

programme.title: Heritages
programme.desc: After being forced to flee Lebanon three times, a Lebanese filmmaker explores his roots and examines pivotal periods in the country's history.

programme.title: Babour Ellouh
programme.desc: The events revolve around the bitter reality of young Algerians, who resort to fleeing and traveling illegally in search of a better future, which reveals many tragic stories.

programme.title: Ahl Al-Gharam 3
programme.desc: A romantic drama that highlights love stories which end with failure due to various social circumstances. The five parts are called "The Impossible Love", "September Rain", "After You, My Love", "Thank You for Forgetting", "Beautiful Like the Moon", and "O Neighbor of the Valley".

programme.title: El Karazoun
programme.desc: A Syrian businessman, Adnan, travels to Beirut and gets exposed to an accident at the port explosion, so he decides to disappear in order to teach his spoiled daughter, Nour, how to be self-reliant and discover the truth around her. However, Karim and Rabee try to seize Nour's wealth.

programme.title: Thuluj alsayf
programme.desc: Among people’s every day stories, Ahmed and Nabila share love but their careers matter a lot in supporting their families. In Laila’s story, she is an undergraduate whose family depends on her father’s small income, and she seldom sees her married siblings. A third story is about Bothayna and Salah who are happily married with a son, but are parted when Salah gets shot while chasing smugglers.

programme.title: Harem Al-Shawish

programme.desc: It discusses the change between the past and the present, as the events are set between the 1980s and the year 2014 through Abu Nawras, who lives in a working-class neighborhood and has many children.

programme.desc: The story of a woman whose husband has died. She and her son move to live with his family. Afterwards, her relationship with another man causes many conflicts in the family.

She suffers in her life and believes that there is no place for love in her, after her lover left her to marry her sister. Nakuul Mehta, Disha Parmar, Amit Singh Thakur, Rohan Kapoor, Alefia Kapadia, Jyoti Tiwari, Ekta Kapoor, Sahir Raza

programme.title: Arbeeny Fy el Eshreen
programme.desc: Fahd wakes up after a coma that lasted nearly twenty years and finds himself at the age of forty. He tries to remember and learn everything he has missed. He is surprised by his wife's (Ahd) divorce from him, and her closeness to his cousin Saleh. He finds himself at a crossroads, either to continue alone or to defend his previous life and recover it, whatever the consequences are.

programme.title: Ghamam's Island (Ep8)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance, History, Thriller, Fantasy 2022 Everything turns upside down on Ghamam Island when Shiekh Madien gives the sins note to his follower before his death, a drowned body by coincidence is discovered, and a gypsy shows up in the village. Tareq Lotfy, Fathy Abd Alwahab, Mai Ezz Al Din, Ahmed Amin, Wafaa Amer, Mohamed Gom`aa, Riyad Al Khouly, Hussein El Menbawy, Abdel Rahim Kamal

programme.title: Bab Al Hara (Ep21)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2008 Last century, during the French occupation, a Syrian neighborhood defending their culture, values and traditions against the enemy. Samer Almasry, Sabah Al Jazaaery, Wafaa Mousilly, Huda Sharawy, Wafeeq Al Zaeem, Bassam Al Molla, Marwan Kawouk

programme.title: Be My Sunshine (Ep71)
programme.desc: Comedy, Romance 2021 Hazira travels to a remote island to explore a land her bosses want to take to establish a resort. She meets Poyraz, a young man who owns a small olive factory. Without knowing, she ruins his work. Ayca Aysin Turan, Alp Navruz, Nihan Büyükagaç, Ipek Tenolcay, Bülent Çolak, Ali Bilgin, Özgür Sevimli, Aksel Bonfil, Yesim Citak, Yelda Eroglu, Dilek Iyigün, Emine Yildirim

programme.title: Bade Achhe Lagte Hain 2
programme.desc: Priya and Ram are two people from different worlds. As circumstances bring them together, they get married, and over time, their bond gets stronger as they fall in love.

programme.title: Beirut's Bride (Ep58)
programme.desc: Drama, Romance 2019 A young businessman falls in love with a female singer, but his mother doesn't accept their relationship and tries to separate them by all means. Dhaffer Alabedin, Karmen Bsebas, Takla Chamoun, Joe Torad, Mohamed Al-Ahmed, Imra Kabakusak, Nadine Gaber

programme.title: Jazeerat Ghamam
programme.desc: When Khaldoun and the gypsy Al-Ayqa settle on Ghamam island, they try to control its people, thinking that it contains a treasure and a great secret that no one knows. As they try to extend their influence to implement their plan, will the people of the island confront them led by Arafat, El Ajami, and Muharib?

programme.title: Without Restraint (Ep17)
programme.desc: Romance, Drama 2021 Ghazal is trapped in an unwanted marriage to a controlling businessman due to his power and her family's passiveness. However, everything changes when her heart and Seif El Khedewy's heart are united by fearless love. Yasmin Abd Al Aziz, Ahmed Al Awady, Khaled Al Sawy, Dina Fouaad, Khaled Sarhan, Amr Mahmoud Yasin, Mustafa Fikry

programme.title: Bab Al-Hara 3
programme.desc: The tale of the revolutionary struggles of the people continues. The neighborhood is shocked by Abu Issam's sudden departure. A new doctor, Ibn Al-Baghgaty, arrives in the neighborhood, showing his skill in treating incurable diseases.

programme.title: Gharib's Home (Ep1)
programme.desc: People, Drama 2021 A man's life changes after his wife's death and faces several challenges while he is trying to provide a good life for his family, he also helps others to improve their lives. programme.title: My Name Is Farah
programme.desc: Farah fled Iran and is now employed illegally as a cleaner in Istanbul. Her life is turned upside down when she witnesses a murder at work, preventing her from traveling to France to care for her ill son. She then makes an attempt to flee from the criminals after they identify her.

programme.title: Zelzal
programme.desc: Harbi buys a house in installments from Khalil who refuses to register the house in Harbi's name after he completes the payment. When the earthquake of 1992 happens, Harbi dies. Khalil refuses to hand over the land to the heirs and clashes with Harbi's son, Mohamed, who loves Khalil's daughter.

programme.title: Al-Heiba Al-Awda
programme.desc: When Jabal's father is murdered, the blood feud sends his family and the Al-Sa'eid family into a cycle of violence and tribal conflicts, as those who have unfinished business with Jabal's father appear to complicate things for Jabal.

programme.title: Udaariyaan
programme.desc: Sandhu's family comes from a small village in Punjab; however, as the daughter Jasmine dreams of immigrating to Canada, the dreams of the two sisters Tejo and Jasmine soon change when fate brings them a different reality.

programme.title: Hayya Al Rouh
programme.desc: The story follows an angelic girl named Haya, who, despite her disability, defies all circumstances and insists on confronting them, especially her uncle Mubarak, who left her in the care of her stepfather, Abdul Rahman.

programme.title: End Share 9
programme.desc: After he became wealthy following an unexpected event that took place years ago, Fares finds himself targeted by Adnan and a person close to him.

programme.title: Nasibi Wa Qesmetik
programme.desc: Connected but separate episodes dealing with 15 different topics, divided into 3 episodes each topic, discussing the relationship between men and women, the problems that occur between them, and how they can be overcome.

programme.desc: Mae Cacamwnci yn ôl gyda mwy o sgetsys dwl a doniol! Cacamwnci is back with more funny and silly sketches to make you laugh!

programme.title: Patrôl Pawennau
programme.desc: Mae Francois ar goll ar y môr ar ôl iddo fenthyca cwch Capten Cimwch i fynd i wylio'r morfilod. Francois is lost at sea after he takes Cap'n Cimwch's boat to go whale-watching

programme.title: Ne-wff-ion
programme.desc: Mae Lwsi'n ymweld â theulu sy'n addysgu eu plant gartre, a'r gwersi yn cynnwys dysgu am wenyn, mêl, a gwneud cloc haul. On Newffion today Lwsi visits a family that home-teach their children.

programme.title: Blero'n mynd i Ocido
programme.desc: Pan fydd Blero'n helpu Rheinallt i bobi mae pethau'n mynd o chwith wrth iddo gael y mesuriadau'n anghywir. A spot of baking with Rheinallt goes awry when Blero gets the quantities wrong!

programme.title: Awyr Iach
programme.desc: Heddiw, bydd Huw yn ymuno gyda theulu sy'n cneifio ar eu fferm, Erin yn chwarae rygbi, a Meleri yn mynd am dro gyda Mai ym Mharc Cwm Darran. Today: sheep shearing and rugby.

programme.title: New: Penblwyddi Cyw
programme.desc: Os wyt ti'n dathlu dy ben-blwydd, dyma gyfle i ti weld dy lun ar Cyw. If you're celebrating your birthday, you may be lucky enough to see your photo on today's Cyw.

programme.title: Mynyddoedd y Byd: Yr Himalaia
programme.desc: Ffion Dafis sy'n teithio ar hyd lôn newydd sy'n treiddio i galon yr Himalaia. Ffion Dafis travels the length of a new road which has penetrated right to the heart of the Himalayas.

programme.title: Mynyddoedd y Byd Yr Himalaia - Ffion Dafis
Y Fets
programme.desc: Mae gofid am gyflwr Bandit y fferet, a Hannah a Dafydd sy'n gwneud llawdriniaeth frys ar lo. The father and son vets, Harry and Hywel, are vaccinating donkeys and testing a herd for TB.

programme.title: Y 'Sgubor Flodau
programme.desc: Ffoaduriaid o'r Wcrain sy'n diolch i staff Gwersyll yr Urdd Llangrannog am eu cymorth wrth iddynt ymgartrefu yng Nghymru dros dro. This time, Ukrainian refugees say thank you with flowers.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: Bydd Lowri Morgan ym Merthyr Tudful i ddathlu bywyd a gwaith y cyfansoddwr Joseph Parry. We celebrate the composer Joseph Parry, and enjoy a feast of hymns from Canolfan Soar in the town.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol Emynau Joseph Parry - Season 1, Episode 1
Dan Do
programme.desc: Yn y rhaglen hon, awn draw i Ynys Môn i weld rheithordy lliwgar sy'n llawn nodweddion Sioraidd. We visit a restored chapel in Abererch and a popular Welsh singer's luxurious home.

programme.title: Tir Cymru
programme.desc: Bydd Iolo Williams yn darganfod y tirluniau rhyfeddol sydd y tu mewn i ogofau naturiol a'r rhai sydd wedi eu creu gan bobl. Iolo Williams looks at the stunning landscapes inside caves.

programme.title: Tir Cymru O Dan yr Wyneb
Ffilmiau Ddoe
programme.desc: Gwyliau fydd dan sylw Ffion Dafis a'i gwesteion wrth iddynt edrych ar hen ffilmiau o'r Archif Sgrin a Sain. Gwion Hallam's journey takes him from Llandudno to Burry Port and the Urdd camps.

programme.title: Ffilmiau Ddoe Ffion Dafis - Season 1, Episode 2
Ty Am Ddim
programme.desc: Ty llawn llanast sydd ar y sioe heno ym Mhontarddulais - ty hordar sy'n cael ei brynu gan y cyngor sydd heb weld y tu fewn. Tonight, a couple deals with a hoarder's house in Pontarddulais,

programme.title: Ty am Ddim Pontarddulais - Season 3, Episode 7
Ar Werth
programme.desc: Hen fanc ym Mhenmaenmawr, ty ar yr afon yng nghanol Caerdydd, a'r hen glwb Ceidwadwyr yn Aberystwyth sy'n mynd dan y morthwyl. We find out how a number of properties get on at auction.

programme.title: Cefn Gwlad
programme.desc: Wedi 70ml o odro ar fferm Troedyraur, mae'r tad a mab Teifi a Rhys Evans wedi penderfynu gwerthu'r fuches laeth. We follow a father and son as they prepare to sell their herd after 70 years.

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi: Iwerddon v Cymru
programme.desc: Cyfle arall i weld y gêm rygbi Chwe Gwlad rhwng Iwerddon a Chymru. Stadiwm Aviva, Dulyn. Another chance to see the Six Nations rugby match between Ireland and Wales. Aviva Stadium, Dublin.

programme.title: Clwb Rygbi Rhyngwladol Iwerddon v Cymru
Pobol y Cwm Omnibws
programme.desc: Cipolwg yn ôl dros ddigwyddiadau'r wythnos yng Nghwmderi. Omnibus edition looking back at events in the fictional village of Cwmderi over the past week. With on-screen English subtitles.

programme.title: Newyddion a Chwaraeon
programme.desc: Newyddion a chwaraeon y penwythnos. Weekend news and sport.

programme.title: New: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol
programme.desc: I nodi Mis Hanes LHDTC+, bydd Nia yn yr Almaen i gwrdd â'r Cymro alltud John Sam Jones, dyn hoyw sy'n adrodd stori ryfeddol o faddeuant, trugaredd a chariad. We mark LGBTQ+ History Month.

programme.title: Dechrau Canu Dechrau Canmol Mis Hanes LHDTC+ - Season 1, Episode 1
New: Am Dro
programme.desc: Andy, Carys, Sian a Gwilym sy'n mynd am dro i Fodffordd a Llangefni, Caernarfon a'r Foryd, Llandaf a Chaerdydd, a Charreg Cennen. We walk around Llangefni, Caernarfon, Cardiff, & a castle.

programme.title: Gogglebocs Cymru
programme.desc: Mae Gogglebocs Cymru 'nôl. Ymunwch â Tudur Owen a'i ffrindiau - hen a newydd - i sbio ar deledu'r wythnos o Gymru a thu hwnt. Gogglebocs Cymru is back, with laughter, tears and arguments.

programme.title: Can i Gymru: Dathlu'r 50
programme.desc: Roedd Cân i Gymru yn dathlu 50 yn 2019 ac yn y rhaglen hon edrychwn nôl dros hanner can mlynedd o'r gystadleuaeth. Special documentary from 2019 celebrating 50 years of the song competition.

programme.title: Y Ditectif
programme.desc: Achos dyn o Gaernarfon gafodd ddedfryd o 50 mlynedd mewn carchar ar ôl teithio i America i dreisio merch 10 oed. The case of a Caernarfon man imprisoned for raping a 10 year old in Oregon.
